headline: A Look At Howmet Aerospace (HWM) Valuation After Analyst Upgrades And Raised Guidance
summary: Recent analyst upgrades have pushed Howmet Aerospace (HWM) into focus after the company raised its financial guidance, supported by revenue growth across commercial and defense aerospace, as well as higher dividends and share repurchases. See our latest analysis for Howmet Aerospace. Those upgrades and guidance changes come after a strong run in the shares, with the latest close at $218.27, a 30 day share price return of 13.45% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 94.29%.
